ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.5 ounce) package fruit flavored mini marshmallows

cookingTips: Melt butter and marshmallows together over low heat, stirring constantly to prevent burning
Work quickly once the mixture is combined - it hardens fast
Grease your spatula with butter for easier spreading
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple, kid-friendly treat. Guide the cook on managing heat to prevent scorching and working quickly before the mixture sets.
